Package com.xmlmind.ditac.convert

Implementation of the ditac command-line utility.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FOConverter
    Interface allowing the Converter to use the services of an XSL-FO processor such as Apache FOP, RenderX XEP, etc.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConsoleErrorListener
    An implementation of ErrorListener which displays its messages on a Console.
    Converter
    Implementation of the ditac command-line utility.
    ExternalFOConverter
    An implementation of FOConverter based on an external command-line utility such as /opt/xep/xep, D:\opt\fop\fop.bat, etc.
    ResourceCopier
    An implementation of ResourceHandler which simply copies its resource arguments to the directory specified in its parameter string.
    StyleSheetCache
    A simple XSL stylesheet cache.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Format
    Output format of a Converter.

Package com.xmlmind.ditac.convert Description

Implementation of the ditac command-line utility.

com.xmlmind.ditac.convert.Converter, the class which is at the core of the ditac command-line utility, has been designed in order to be easily embedded in any Java desktop or server-side application. However a lower-level alternative to embedding Converter consists in embedding com.xmlmind.ditac.preprocess.PreProcessor.
